DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine wether topical rapamycin is more efficient than topical steroids in the treatment of chronic erosive lichen planus.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Topical Rapamycin to Treat Chronic Erosive Oral Lichen
